ei shala robin gudmarani r byata, banglatorrents ke gali dibi to jeev tor chhire nebo kutta r bachha. 2/4 te baal r cinema upload kore bhabchhis bt ke tekka dibi? abar ddr niye kotha? ddr tor mukhe mute diteo asbe na. bokachoda, tor cinema kojon d/l kore re. bt r kachhe tui to nossi. fata bNase bichi atkechhe tai gali dichhis bt ke. ghar dhakka kheyechhis lojja kore na? chupchap pNode angul diye shuye thak shala abalchoda.

@ joylogy

bt - Alexa Rank :- 55,000 ( approx ) ! (September) !

bt - Alexa Rank :- 69,000 ( approx ) !  ( 10 th October ) ! Down Down Down !

Sona, TPB Alexa Rank - 85 !

Ami Jadi Mukh Kharap Kari Ta Hale Tor Ki Abostha Habe Seta Tamaltoru Ke Ask Kara Dekhte Paris ! Toke 2 to Info Di !

1) ddr er member nije amar kajer prasonsha kareche amar post e ami galagali debar age ! biswas na hay amar post gulo pare dekhte paris !

2) Tui To bt er mod ! vison savyo, bhadro chele ! tui bt te base eai abusive words gulo use karte parbi ?

3) Tor site er mod + general member ra jakhon amar torrent file ditto copy kare takhon 500 d/l hay ar 200 jon thanks dey ! tui o diyechis ! maja ta hache tarpar tui e amake galagal dite aschis ? khub hasi pelo !

4) Total failure of your site as because you & your members always try to stealing my torrents in a regular basis !

5) Paglu d/l hayeche 500 ta mato + Fighter d/l hayche 200 ta mato ! jekhane 3000 mato d/l hato ! toder janyo kosto hache brother je ebar taka paisa gulo sab toder pocket theke dite hache ! tai na ?

6) Tui ekta forum er moderator ! TPB te amar mato 10,000 uploader ache ! amake eto Gurutto dewa ta toder failure ke nirdesh karche !

7) Tora katobar kauke tarate paris ? se just ekta ip address change kare 5 $ diye dhuke jabe ar toder pichone bansh debe ! eai easy kotha ta bojbar mato abostha tor nei kano sona ???

8) Anonno, b65ran, supriyo, debpk77, panjabiwala, swapnerpheriwala, D2L, SABJANTU,
Badal (raindropusa ), bdraj, MASERATTI, 
Gladiator (eder mother ) & Tor Ma - Era to sab kutta diye chidiye toder janmo diyeche ! Ar regularly kuttar maal kinche khay seta bhule jas kano sona ? tor ma ke ask karis ! kalka amar baba tor mar gude mal felbar janyo amader pet kutta take niye gechilo ! kutta tar sarir ektu kharap chilo ! tai tor make chodbar samay tor mar mukhe bami kare dey ! tor ma to khete pay na ! tai kuttar bami gulu chete kheye nilo ! biswas na hay tor ma ke ask karte paris !

9) Ami tor bt + tar 66000 baba + ma chodar gushthi ke chudi ! tui amar jeev tene chinre nibi balchili na ! jadi er pare o na paris tahale tor maar ganga nadir mato chowra gunde nijer shukno , chotto nunu ta dhukiye rakh ! aram pabi !

10) Tor baler ddr member der ektu parasuno karte balis ! s/w samondhe kono knowledge ache ? 

Immutable Variables, Inline expression, Closure Conversion, Lazy Evolution, Parametric Polymorphism Ki Bhave Single Pass Theke 2-Pass Compiler Construction E Work Kare Segulo Pare Dekh ! Computer To Toder Kache Ekta Black Box Matro ! Number Theory Ar WFF Theke 2nd Order (FPL) Add Kare Ki Bhabe Take Compiler E Use Kare Software Change Kara Jai Se Bapare Toder Kono Knowledge Ache Murkho ? Tabe Toder Mathay Je Pariman Gobor Pora Ache Ar Tor Abal Team Member Der Buddhi Eto Kom Je Sara Jibon Eo Tora Esab Sunis Ni ! Ar Nijeder Samondhe Khub To Barai Karis ! Braggadocio !

Are Annyo Der S/W Use Na Kare Toder Mathay Jakon Eto E Buddhi To S/W Development Kare Dekha ! Sudhu Eta E Toder Originality Proof Karte Pare ! Amar Kache Tora Cheap Quality Er Chor Chara Ar Kichu Nos ! Toder Baler
Member Der Koto Public Galagal Dey Seta Google Search Kare Dekh ! Tar Par Toder Quality Niye Garbo Karis !

Ki bhabe file size same rekhe watermark use karte hay tai to toder member ra jane na ! hasi pay ! je 6 years dhare matro 60 ta bangla film up karte pereche tader mukhe baro baro katha manay na re murkho ! 

chodna joy, abar asis ! tor mato beshya er santander anek dit chata hay ni ! Be Happy !

@ joylogy

Aro ekta katha jene rakh khanir cheler 100 number chudmarnir gandu choda bhai toder debpk77 je site ta chalay tader mod der ( toder mato ) amar torrent churi karte nirdesh dey ! TPB te pare ache kano ? khamata thake to ekhan theke beriye giye nijer + tor site e gaand marak na ! toder ddr ra halo chorder mahaguru ! nijer real naam ta likhte balis terrorist ta ke ! nayto se bejammar bachcha bujhli sukor er chana ? toder oai baler ddr team er ami eka bangali pond mere diyechi ! amar 1 GBPS connection thakle oai baler team er mukhe keu mut taeo jeto na bhuli chudir bhai ! are ami ja 1st release kari toder ddr team er baki sabai ta dekhe pare release kare ! katha ta mileo nis ! toder baler site + 66,000 inactive user + baler ddr team ke matro eka bangali hariye dilo ! Lajja Lajja ! 

Tor bara te tor mayer guder garte dhukiya rosopan koro joy gandu choda ar tor uronto baper jhulonto bichi niye danguli khelo debpk77 er mayer gude base ! Thanks..

@ joylogy

Tui / Tora amar pichone parechis kano bujhte parchi !  

1. Jakhon sabai free te ( kono share ratio chara ) movie d/l karte pache takhon 5 $ kharoch kare tor site e jabe kano + jekhane anek pressure niye seed karbe habe ?

2. Toder business nasto haye jache ! etai toder ek matro raager karon ! ebar vikhha na kare nijer rupee kharoch kare vara kara server er taka dite hache to ! ekhono abdhi october month e 10 $ to donation peyechis tai na ?

3. Tui to bhalo kare DVD Rip ki bhave karte hay tao janis na ! kintu sanjantu ke tel diye mod haye basechis ! ar sanjantu 256 kbps connection niye bal chirche bangladeshe base ! he he he !

4. Toke to bt te base ageo galagal karechi ! mane parche chodna ? ami abar bt er member hayechi ! jato bar sarabi ip change kare toder 5 $ vikhha diye dhuke pichone shal gunje debo ! paris to atka !

5. bt ke demolish kare debo ami eka bangali ! sab new movie TPB charbo jate toder site theke d/l keu na kare ! bt er monopoly + toder business er sarbonaash kare charbo !

6. bt ke banchate 4 to rasta khola !

A. free registration kare de !
B. dedicated server use kar !
C. share ratio tule de !
D. advertisement theke taka collect kar !

7. Ekta katha jene rakh ! manush free te kono kichu pele kichutei tor site e jabe na ! tor site ta free kare de ! ami up kara chere debo ! karon takhon ar amar up karbar prayojon e parbe na !
eta gathon mulok samalochona ! jadi bhalo kare paris ta hale amar jukti ta bujhte parbi !

8. Are ami to kharap chele ! baje , kharap language use kari ! satti bokachoda public ! kintu tora to site e Satyajit Ray + Rabindranath Thakur er photo , leka , bani use karis ! tui amake galagal dili ete ki toder site er gourab increase halo na tor reputation kharap halo ? er par general user balbe na ja " joyda tumi bt te bhadro, savyo thako ar baire giye ekta baje chele ke khub kadorjo, kutsit , kuruchikor language e gaglgal dao ! " - tor kache er kono jabab ache ! ami jadi goo khete jai tui o goo khete e jabi ???

eta ki thik noy je toder mato bhadro, savyo  chele rai ekta mask pare ghure beray ar darkar parlei + nijer swarthe gha laglei kutsit real nagno chhabi ta beriye pare ???

Bravo Joy Bravo !
